channel.title: unifi on John's Two Cents
channel.description: Recent content in unifi on John's Two Cents

item.title: Sonos on a different vlan using the Unifi USG
item.description: Lately, I have been doing some changes on my home network that involved vlanning. Of course, when you say vlan & Sonos in one sentence you’ve got to make ready for some issues. You can find my lessons learned in this blog. I can tell you that it wasn’t easy to overcome this. Situation My network looks a little bit like this: Vlan: Internet of things Vlan: End user devices Lan with all the Unifi devices I’m using a Unifi Cloudkey Gen2 plus as my Unifi controller.
